terms.User Interface (UI): The visual components and layout that enable user interaction with the application.
terms.Task: A specific piece of work or action item to be completed.
terms.Todo App: An application that allows users to create, manage, and track tasks or to-do items.

termsNeedingRefinement.reason: Ambiguous - could mean developing the app from scratch, customizing an existing solution, or integrating various components.

openQuestions: What features and functionality should the Todo App include (e.g., task creation, due dates, reminders, categorization, etc.)?
Will the Todo App be a web application, mobile app, desktop app, or a combination?
Are there any specific design or branding requirements for the User Interface (UI)?
Should the Todo App support multiple users or just a single user?
Are there any data storage or persistence requirements (e.g., local storage, cloud database)?
Are there any specific performance or scalability requirements?
What is the expected timeline and budget for developing the Todo App?
Are there any third-party integrations or API connections required (e.g., calendar, notifications)?
engineQuestions: Are there any preferred programming languages, frameworks, or technologies for building the Todo App?
Would you like to explore the possibility of using a low-code or no-code development platform for this project?
validationMethod: Conduct user acceptance testing with a representative sample of target users to verify the Todo App meets their needs and expectations.
Perform functional testing to ensure all specified features and requirements are implemented correctly.
Conduct performance testing to measure the application's responsiveness and scalability under different load conditions.
Evaluate the code quality and adherence to best practices through code reviews and static analysis tools.
